daily_summary.headline: Aurora Alert and Routine Starlink Launches

top_events.title: Aurora Opportunity
top_events.description: A G1 level geomagnetic storm is predicted, offering a chance to view auroras at high latitudes.
top_events.action: Check aurora forecasts and prepare for viewing at high latitudes.

top_events.title: Starlink Group 17-13 Launch
top_events.description: Routine launch of Starlink satellites by SpaceX.

top_events.title: Firefly Alpha Test Flight
top_events.description: Firefly Alpha's test flight to validate key systems.
top_events.action: Follow updates for test flight results.

opportunities.recommendation: Possible aurora at high latitudes. Best for northern locations (65°+). Worth checking if conditions are optimal.
